description: This file defines an Angular service called FileTreeStateService that manages UI state for a file tree view, such as expanded folders and selected nodes. It uses RxJS BehaviorSubjects to keep track of the state and provides methods to toggle, expand, collapse, and select nodes, as well as expand a path of nodes.

classes.name: FileTreeStateService
classes.description: An Angular service responsible for managing the state of a file tree UI, including expanded folders and selected nodes.

methods.name: toggleExpanded
methods.description: Toggles the expanded/collapsed state of a folder node by its id.

methods.name: expand
methods.description: Expands a folder node by its id.

methods.name: collapse
methods.description: Collapses a folder node by its id.

methods.name: select
methods.description: Sets the selected node id, or clears selection if null.

methods.name: expandPath
methods.description: Expands all folder nodes along a given path of FileTreeNode objects.

ctags.name: expandedIdsSubject

fields.name: private readonly expandedIdsSubject = new BehaviorSubject<Set<string>>(new Set());
